alert.note: Alert for Greene; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 7:28PM EDT until July 13 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ulster County in east central New York... Southwestern Greene County in east central New York... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Prattsville to near Fleischmanns to 7 miles west of Woodland Valley Campground, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hunter, Woodstock, Windham, Prattsville, Phoenicia, Lanesville, North-South Lake Campground, Cairo, Shandaken, Ashland, Jewett, Lexington, Tannersville, North Lexington, Maplecrest, Oliverea, Round Top, Seager, Pine Hill and Red Falls. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
